__e: I want you to think about your aunt Kathy and about her last moments on earth and whether you want the same thing to happen to the rest of your family.
Guys, I just saw Kathy and she's acting...
When you were late last night, Kathy and I got to talking and one thing led to another, and...
Kathy comes over with my breakfast....
Kathy said she knew how to make it work, that there was a young tart at the bureau who no-one would miss, who would deserve it.
Kathy, I'd love to have a chat.
And frankly, Kathy, for some time now, I haven't been feeling too well, so...
Kathy, I know you're in there.
